import { useState } from "react" const containerStyle={ display : "flex", alignItems : "center", gap : "16px" } const starContainerStyle = { display : "flex", gap : "8px" } export default function Stars({MaxRating = 5 , color , size }){ const [rating , setRaiting] = useState(0); const [tempRating , setTempRating] = useState(0) function handleRating(rating){ setRaiting(rating) } const textStyle = { lineHeight : "2", margin : "0", color, fontSize:`${size}px` } return(
{Array.from({length : MaxRating} , (_ , i)=>( handleRating(i + 1)} key={i} full ={tempRating?tempRating>=i+1:rating>= i+1} enterMouse ={()=> setTempRating(i+1)} leaveMouse ={()=> setTempRating(0)} size={size} color = {color}/>))}

{tempRating || rating || ""}

) } function Star({onRate , full , enterMouse , leaveMouse , size , color}){ const starStyle = { width : `${size}px`, height : `${size}px`, display : "block", cursor : "pointer", color :color } return( { full ? : } ) }
